description: .1: "Wiley Post from the Pratt & Whitney Aircraft Co." in gold inlay in front of trigger guard; red rubber shock absorber on butt, detail tooling on barrels; diamond carved into wood of forearm; .2: leather case; .3 extra double barrel
title: Winchester Model 21 Trap Shotgun made for Wiley Post
